verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to <S%H740>Ariel<s%>, to <S%H740>Ariel<s%>, the <S%H7151>city<s%> where <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2583>dwelt<s%>! <S%H5595>add<s%> ye <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year<s%>; let them <S%H5362>kill<s%> <S%H2282>sacrifices<s%>.
Yet I will <S%H6693>distress<s%> <S%H740>Ariel<s%>, and there shall be <S%H8386>heaviness<s%> and <S%H592>sorrow<s%>: and it shall be unto me as <S%H740>Ariel<s%>.

And I will <S%H2583>camp<s%> against thee round <S%H1754>about<s%>, and will lay <S%H6696>siege<s%> against thee with a <S%H4674>mount<s%>, and I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> <S%H4694>forts<s%> against thee.

And thou shalt be brought <S%H8213>down<s%>, and shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> out of the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and thy <S%H565>speech<s%> shall be <S%H7817>low<s%> out of the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall be, as of one that hath a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%>, out of the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and thy <S%H565>speech<s%> shall <S%H6850>whisper<s%> out of the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall be like <S%H1851>small<s%> <S%H80>dust<s%>, and the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the terrible <S%H6184>ones<s%> shall be as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that passeth <S%H5674>away<s%>: yea, it shall be at an <S%H6621>instant<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>.

Thou shalt be <S%H6485>visited<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> with <S%H7482>thunder<s%>, and with <S%H7494>earthquake<s%>, and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>noise<s%>, with <S%H5492>storm<s%> and <S%H5591>tempest<s%>, and the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H6633>fight<s%> against <S%H740>Ariel<s%>, even all that <S%H6638>fight<s%> against her and her <S%H4685>munition<s%>, and that <S%H6693>distress<s%> her, shall be as a <S%H2472>dream<s%> of a <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%>.

It shall even be as when an <S%H7457>hungry<s%> man <S%H2492>dreameth<s%>, and, behold, he <S%H398>eateth<s%>; but he <S%H6974>awaketh<s%>, and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7386>empty<s%>: or as <S%H834>when<s%> a thirsty <S%H6771>man<s%> <S%H2492>dreameth<s%>, and, behold, he <S%H8354>drinketh<s%>; but he <S%H6974>awaketh<s%>, and, behold, he is <S%H5889>faint<s%>, and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> hath <S%H8264>appetite<s%>: so shall the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> be, that <S%H6633>fight<s%> against <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

¶ <S%H4102>Stay<s%> yourselves, and <S%H8539>wonder<s%>; cry ye <S%H8173>out<s%>, and <S%H8173>cry<s%>: they are <S%H7937>drunken<s%>, but not with <S%H3196>wine<s%>; they <S%H5128>stagger<s%>, but not with strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath poured <S%H5258>out<s%> upon you the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%>, and hath <S%H6105>closed<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and your <S%H7218>rulers<s%>, the <S%H2374>seers<s%> hath he <S%H3680>covered<s%>.

And the <S%H2380>vision<s%> of all is become unto you as the <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H2856>sealed<s%>, which men <S%H5414>deliver<s%> to one that is <S%H3045>learned<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7121>Read<s%> this, I pray thee: and he <S%H559>saith<s%>, I <S%H3201>cannot<s%>; for it is <S%H2856>sealed<s%>:

And the <S%H5612>book<s%> is <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to him that is not <S%H3045%H5612>learned<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7121>Read<s%> this, I pray thee: and he <S%H559>saith<s%>, I am not <S%H3045>learned<s%>.

¶ Wherefore the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3282>Forasmuch<s%> as this <S%H5971>people<s%> draw <S%H5066>near<s%> me with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and with their <S%H8193>lips<s%> do <S%H3513>honour<s%> me, but have <S%H7368>removed<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, and their <S%H3374>fear<s%> toward me is <S%H3925>taught<s%> by the <S%H4687>precept<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>:

Therefore, behold, I will <S%H3254>proceed<s%> to do a marvellous <S%H6381>work<s%> among this <S%H5971>people<s%>, even a marvellous <S%H6381>work<s%> and a <S%H6382>wonder<s%>: for the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of their <S%H2450>wise<s%> men shall <S%H6>perish<s%>, and the <S%H998>understanding<s%> of their <S%H995>prudent<s%> men shall be <S%H5641>hid<s%>.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto them that seek <S%H6009>deep<s%> to <S%H5641>hide<s%> their <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and their <S%H4639>works<s%> are in the <S%H4285>dark<s%>, and they <S%H559>say<s%>, Who <S%H7200>seeth<s%> us? and who <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> us?

Surely your turning of things upside <S%H2017>down<s%> shall be <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> as the <S%H3335>potter's<s%> <S%H2563>clay<s%>: for shall the <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of him that <S%H6213>made<s%> it, He <S%H6213>made<s%> me not? or shall the thing <S%H3336>framed<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of him that <S%H3335>framed<s%> it, He had no <S%H995>understanding<s%>?

Is it not yet a <S%H4213>very<s%> little <S%H4592>while<s%>, and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%> into a fruitful <S%H3759>field<s%>, and the fruitful <S%H3759>field<s%> shall be <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> as a <S%H3293>forest<s%>?

¶ And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%>, and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H5787>blind<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> out of <S%H652>obscurity<s%>, and out of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.

The <S%H6035>meek<s%> also shall <S%H3254>increase<s%> their <S%H8057>joy<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H34>poor<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For the terrible <S%H6184>one<s%> is brought to <S%H656>nought<s%>, and the <S%H3887>scorner<s%> is <S%H3615>consumed<s%>, and all that <S%H8245>watch<s%> for <S%H205>iniquity<s%> are cut <S%H3772>off<s%>:

That make a <S%H120>man<s%> an <S%H2398>offender<s%> for a <S%H1697>word<s%>, and lay a <S%H6983>snare<s%> for him that <S%H3198>reproveth<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H6662>just<s%> for a thing of <S%H8414>nought<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, who <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, concerning the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall not now be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, neither shall his <S%H6440>face<s%> now wax <S%H2357>pale<s%>.

But when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> his <S%H3206>children<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of mine <S%H3027>hands<s%>, in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of him, they shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and shall <S%H6206>fear<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
They also that <S%H8582>erred<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H3045>come<s%> to <S%H998>understanding<s%>, and they that <S%H7279>murmured<s%> shall <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H3948>doctrine<s%>.
